meaning_str.bing:
n. （尤指男式的）衬衫
网络. 衬衣；男衬衫；上衣

（尤指男士的）衬衫；衬衣；（英式橄榄球或其他运动的）队服
为…穿上衬衫；为…提供衬衫

1.en: Mike said the Christmas snap of the dad without his shirt on and the rest of his family in pyjamas was one of his favourites.
1.cn: 麦克说，那张爸爸没穿上衣而他的家人都穿睡衣的圣诞快照是他最喜欢的其中一张。

2.en: While I waited for her to arrive I changedmy shirt and put on my good suit.
2.cn: 在我等她的时候，我换上了我的衬衫，穿上了我比较好的套装。

3.en: Actually . . . with a huge hole in the front of my shirt since I still refuse to go shopping.
3.cn: 事实上，衬衫的前面应该还有个大洞，因为我一直不愿去买件新的。

0.en: Daddy, what’s that shirt? It’s my football shirt.
0.cn: 爸爸，那个衬衫是什么？那是我的足球衫。

1.en: Oh, gosh, you got some on your shirt.

2.cn: 我喜欢你的衬衫！非常时髦。

3.en: You mean your pink shirt? Faded salmon color. No, I haven't seen your pink shirt.
3.cn: 你是说你的粉红色衬衫吗？淡鲑鱼色？不，我没有看到你的粉红色衬衫。

4.en: Hey. Has anyone seen my shirt? It's a button down, like a, like a faded salmon?
4.cn: 有人看到我的衬衫吗？它是前开式的衬衫，淡鲑鱼色。

5.en: That's my favorite shirt. Okay? I love that shirt. Well, just ask Mona to give it back.
5.cn: 它是我最喜欢的衬衫，我爱它。请蒙娜把它还给你。

6.en: I thought I'd wear a shirt today. You know, being the last day and all.
6.cn: 我觉得今天应该穿衬衫来，最后一天了。

7.en: I'm going to need a larger shirt. This one's a little tight under the arms.
7.cn: 我需要一件更大的衬衫，这件腋下部位有点紧。

8.en: Don't be sad, Squidward. I left you a little surprise under your shirt.
8.cn: 别伤心，章鱼哥，我在你的衬衫下留了一点小惊喜！

9.en: Hi, Chris. Mr. Frohm, good to see you. Nice shirt. Thank you, sir.
9.cn: 嗨，克里斯。弗雷姆先生，见到您很高兴，衬衫很漂亮。谢谢。

10.en: Chandler, I know, I know. Hey, you can see your nipples through this shirt.
10.cn: 钱德，我知道。嗨，你可以透过你的衬衫看自己的乳头。

11.en: I like your shirt. Very smart. Thank you. Come on, let's play football.
11.cn: 我喜欢你的衬衫！非常时髦！谢谢。走吧，我们去踢足球吧。

12.en: Okay, all right, moving on. Oh, wow, a paisley shirt. It goes with my corduroy suit.
12.cn: 好的，我继续找，羊毛针织花衬衫。它正好配我那件灯芯绒外套。

13.en: Can you see my nipples through this shirt? No, but don't worry. I'm sure they're still there.
13.cn: 你能透过衬衫看见我的乳头吗？看不见，但别担心，它们还在。

14.en: How can you not believe in evolution? I don't know, just don't. Look at this funky shirt.
14.cn: 你怎么能不相信进化论？我不知道，就是不相信，看看这条怪衬衫！

15.en: Suit, shirt, shoes, ties, boutonniere. I can't believe this is really happening! Right?
15.cn: 西服，衬衫，皮鞋，领带，胸花，不敢相信这真的就要发生了，对吧？

16.en: Daddy, you’ve made your shirt all muddy! Of course, Peppa. Football shirts are meant to be muddy.
16.cn: 爸爸，你把你的衬衫弄得全是泥！当然了，佩佩。足球衫注定是泥的。

17.en: Well I've got an audition down the street and I spilled sauce all over the front of my shirt. You got an extra one?
17.cn: 我要在街尾试镜，结果酱汁沾到衣服上了。你有多余的衬衫吗？

18.en: But Daddy, you have the white shirt. Just take off your jacket. See? Fantastic! Thank you, Peppa.
18.cn: 但是爸爸，你有白色的衬衫啊。只要脱掉外套，看？太棒了！谢谢你，佩佩。

19.en: Daddy, you've made your shirt all muddy. Of course, Peppa. Football shirts are meant to be muddy.
19.cn: 爸爸，你又把你的衬衫给弄脏了！当然了，佩奇。踢足球时足球服肯定会被弄脏的。
